alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 2:04PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow showers above 2000 feet occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Western Siskiyou County above 2000 feet, including portions of highway 96, Sawyers Bar Road, all of Interstate 5, highways 3 and 96, and 89. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. Do not detour during winter storms. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is occurring and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
